name: Egypt Marble
description:
RIDDLE OF THE SPHINX IS WAITING FOR YOU TO SOLVE!
In Greek legend, the Sphinx devoured all travelers who could not answer the riddle it posed: "What is the creature that walks on four legs in the morning, two legs at noon and three in the evening?",Those who fail to solve the riddle have to perish or accept new challenge of Marble Lost!
'Egypt Marble - Marble Lost' is a Zuma-like (marble shoot out, match 3) game with the Egyptian theme. It is easy to play, but truly addictive.
Your goal is to clear all the marbles before they reach the end of the path, and meanwhile, achieve Combos, Chains and Gaps as many as possible to get the highest score.
Egypt Marble is a brand new and amazing zuma-style game! Hottest zuma-style game finally come back!
For the legendary treasures, you have to survive in over six different secret scenes. Discover the lost civilization!

How to play:
1. Match three or more same color balls before they reach the cave.
2. Tap on the transmitter can swapping the current ball and the next ball.
3. Boost your score with skills and combos.

Features:
1. Easy to learn but hard to game master.
2. Many secret maps to make the game more addictive.
3. Two game modes and many challenging levels.
4. Arrows, bombs and more interesting props you should learn from game.
